## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock coverage for the next 5 days, factoring in a margin of error for demand variability. While the player intends to buy 40,000 units, this may lead to overstocking, especially considering the current stock level.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  30,000 units is less than the player's planned 40,000 units. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  ~3 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  ~7 days                                 |
| Comments                          | Ordering 30,000 units will cover the forecasted demand for the next 5 days, allowing for a slight margin of error. This order size can be achieved by placing two orders of 15,000 units each. Additionally, this strategy avoids overstocking and reduces the risk of expiring products. |
